version_description:
• Multiple filters can be named and saved. Long-press the filter button to quickly switch between them.
• Other enhancements.
• Text filter's wildcard (*) can be at the beginning as well as the end. For example, filtering the registration using "*WN" will match everything ending in WN.
• Home screen Quick Actions support (3D Touch). Quickly navigate to the current or bookmarked locations.
• Bug fixes.

• New distance from self property. Show and filter by how far away the track is. Look for the new property and callout.
• Improved caching of thumbnail images.
• New ModeSMixer2 support. OpenADSB now connects to Virtual Radar Server, dump1090, and  ModeSMixer2 servers.

• ModeSMixer2 support improvements.
• Other enhancements.
• Bug fixes.
• Keyboard shortcuts for external keyboards, including map navigation and controlling callouts & histories. Hold down the command key to see all the shortcuts.

• Track highlight marks on the selection dialog. Displays EMER, MIL, INT, VFR and MLAT as highlighted text for tracks that are emergency, military, interesting, VFR and multilateration when a track is selected. Fully configurable in Settings.
• The legend now respects the unit settings

• Bookmarked locations can be cleared by selecting "Clear all bookmarks" after long-pressing the location button.
• Improved VoiceOver support.
• Bug fixes.

• Add Planerspotters as a search provider. Long-press a track to display the context menu which has the search option. The search provider is configurable within settings under Track Search.
• Initial Radarcape support.

• Display Project Loon balloons as balloons based on the registration.
• New inverse filter (prepend with "!") to filter by excluding.
• Bug fixes.

• Allow filters to be renamed.
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.
• Bug fixes.
• Allow the display appearance (Dark Mode) to be light, dark or use iOS' setting. Look for this in Settings (gear button) - Display Appearance.

• Improved mouse and trackpad support.
• Other enhancements and bug fixes.

• Initial ADS-B Exchange and general tar1090 support. Look for the new tar1090 ADS-B Exchange track source by long-pressing the settings (gear) button.
• New radio callsign property (based on the operator). New dump1090 category property (A2, A3, etc). Look for these in "Selection Properties" under Track Selection settings.
• On dump1090 infer the operator/airline based on the 3 letter prefix of the callsign.
• Improved and more performant history trails. The history trail is now colored by the aircraft’s altitude at its historical positions.
• Other enhancements and bug fixes.

• Add full history support for tar1090 ADS-B Exchange. Use the All/Recent History button to toggle between all or just recent history. The new tar1090 ADS-B Exchange track source can be selected by long-pressing the settings (gear) button.
• Other enhancements and bug fixes.

• Put tar1090 ADS-B Exchange first in the list of data sources in preparation for phasing out ADS-B Exchange’s VRS interface.
• Add filter by dump1090 category. Allow dump1090 category in callouts.
• Other enhancements and bug fixes.

• Add country property support for dump1090 and tar1090.
• Other enhancements and bug fixes.

Note: ADS-B Exchange is phasing out its Virtual Radar Server support which is being replaced by tar1090. The new tar1090 ADS-B Exchange track source is currently available and can be selected by long-pressing the settings (gear) button.

• Show country flags for dump1090.
• Add detailed aircraft type support for tar1090.
• Improved decoding of dump1090's transponder types (ADS-R and TIS-B).
• Allow settings button to be placed on the right. This is useful on iPad such that the settings menu doesn't cover up the selection dialog.
• Many other enhancements and bug fixes.

• Bug fixes.

Note: ADS-B Exchange is phasing out its Virtual Radar Server support which is being replaced by tar1090. The new tar1090 ADS-B Exchange track source is currently available and can be selected by long-pressing the settings (gear) button.
• Minor bug fixes.
• Bug fixes.
• Bug fixes.
